scripts.startdev: concurrently "pnpm --dir backend start:dev" "pnpm --dir frontend dev2" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.startdevx: concurrently "pnpm --dir backend start:dev" "pnpm --dir frontend dev2" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.reset:backend-setup: pnpm --dir backend install && pnpm --dir backend prisma generate
scripts.reset: pnpm run reset:clean && pnpm run reset:frontend-install && pnpm run reset:backend-setup
scripts.startb: concurrently "pnpm --dir backend start:prod" "pnpm --dir frontend build && pnpm --dir frontend start" "node proxyserver.js"
